title: Bug 77163Load time weaver default verbose setting
description: Bug 77163Load time weaver default verbose setting
EB: The default setting for the load time weaver is (as of 1.2.1rc1) to produceweaving messages rather than ignore them.I think the default should be changedto ignore them.Also, I cannot override the default setting with Daj.weaver.versose="False".This is the implied syntax from docs/examples/build.xml.If this has changedthen build.xml should be updated.Otherwise, the weaver should be fixed to use it!
